category.title: Industry Category
category.description: The industry or niche to analyze (e.g., 'CRM software', 'project management tools', 'email marketing platforms')

yourBrand.title: Your Brand
yourBrand.description: Your brand name to track visibility for

competitors.title: Competitor Brands (Optional)
competitors.description: Competitor brands to compare against. Leave empty to track only your brand.

platforms.title: AI Platforms
platforms.description: Select which AI platforms to query. You must provide API keys for selected platforms below.

promptCount.title: Number of Prompts
promptCount.description: How many template prompts to use (1-5). Ignored if you provide custom prompts.

customPrompts.title: Custom Prompts (Optional)
customPrompts.description: Your own prompts to use instead of templates. When provided, template prompts are skipped. Example: 'What is the best CRM for startups?'

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: Required if using ChatGPT. Get from: platform.openai.com/api-keys

anthropicApiKey.title: Anthropic API Key
anthropicApiKey.description: Required if using Claude. Get from: console.anthropic.com

googleApiKey.title: Google AI API Key
googleApiKey.description: Required if using Gemini. Get from: aistudio.google.com/apikey
